alert.note: Alert for Moultrie; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 06 at 7:47PM CDT until August 06 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MOULTRIE AND SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 746 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shelbyville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, Windsor, Stewardson, Findlay, Strasburg, Clarksburg, Gays, Wolf Creek State Park and Eagle Creek State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and east central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
